courses.subject: cse
courses.name: Introduction to Computer Architecture: A Software Perspective

projects.name: Note Taking APP
projects.description: Served as team lead, organizing sprint meetings and coordinating tasks using Agile methodology; Developed main dashboard and note editor as a back-end developer; Built responsive and lightweight note-taking app with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS;Implemented IndexedDB for large local storage

projects.name: Huffman Compression & Decompression
projects.description: Developed Huffman compression and decompression algorithm in C++; Implemented Huffman tree and bitwise operations for efficient data compression; Achieved data size reduction of up to 80%

projects.name: Weather Web APP
projects.description: Developed a weather web app that utilizes the OpenWeather API to allow users to quickly search for weather information; Implemented JavaScript to display and switch between different weather data and information, providing a user-friendly interface for accessing weather information; Improved user experience by implementing a clean and intuitive design for the app; Demonstrated proficiency in web development and API integration with this project

projects.name: Automobile Registration System
projects.description: Developed back-end API for automobile registration using C; Designed the HashMap data structure to support high-concurrency and low-latency operations; Implemented functions for efficient adding, deleting, searching, and updating of records

projects.name: Restaurant Sales Analysis
projects.description: Collected data of online ratings for over 10,000 restaurants using Python tools and libraries, such as requests and pandas; Filtered and analyzed the data through multiple regression analysis to identify the factors that impact restaurant ratings and sales; Utilized the findings to inform decision-making and improve the restaurants' performance
